content.en: MPTCP Enhancements: Researchers are exploring ways to improve the performance of multipath transmission control protocol (MPTCP) in various scenarios. They are developing algorithms such as AIMD-based multipath congestion control solutions, mReno, and mVeno to enhance bandwidth sharing, cooperation with single-path protocols, and adaptive rate adjustment. Other algorithms like Advanced MPTCP (AMP), D-LIA, and Hybrid congestion control algorithm are being developed to improve congestion control and network assistance. These advancements aim to achieve better performance, fairness, and energy efficiency in MPTCP, especially in wireless and heterogeneous networks.
content.da: MPTCP-forbedringer: Forskere undersøger måder at forbedre ydeevnen af multipath transmission control protocol (MPTCP) i forskellige scenarier. De udvikler algoritmer som AIMD-baserede multipath congestion control-løsninger, mReno og mVeno for at forbedre båndbredde-deling, samarbejde med single-path protokoller og adaptiv hastighedsjustering. Andre algoritmer som Advanced MPTCP (AMP), D-LIA og Hybrid congestion control-algoritmen udvikles for at forbedre congestion control og netværksassistance. Disse fremskridt sigter mod at opnå bedre ydeevne, retfærdighed og energieffektivitet i MPTCP, især i trådløse og heterogene netværk.
